questions.question: Wabonye gute muri rusangi iyi reresi?
answers: Nayikunze kandi yari ngira kamaro
Ntaho mpagaze kandi nibaza ko vyoba vyari ngira kamaro canke atari ngira kamaro
Sinahimbawe n'iyi reresi kandi nibaza ko itari ngira kamaro

questions.question: Ni ubuhe bushobozi buri muri ino reresi?
answers: Gukorera mu runani rwiza
Gutatura impari n'amatati
Kugenzura inyiyumvo zawe

questions.question: Ni iyihe ntumbero y'agakorwa?
answers: Gufasha abanyeshure gukora neza nk'umurwi
Gufasha abanyeshure kumenya uko bokwiyumva bafatiye ku biba biriko biraba
Gufasha abanyeshure kubaza ibibazo bijanye n'impari canke amatati

questions.question: Ni ryari abana bokwerekana igiharuro c'igishogisho bokwiyumva?
answers: Muri urya mwanya nyene umwigisha ariko aravuga agakuru
Inyuma yuko umwigisha ahejeje kuvuga udukuru twose dutatu
Inyuma yuko umwigisha ahejeje kuvuga agakuru kamwe-kamwe kose

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa guhindura udukuru mvuga igihe cose ndiko ndimenyerereza hamwe n'abanyeshure
Notegerezwa gutera udukuru two gutera ubwoba abanyeshure
Notegerezwa gushiraho umukazo ku banyeshure kugira basigure igituma bahisemwo ibishobisho kanaka

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa kwihutisha abanyeshure mu guhitamwo igishogisho ningoga na ningoga
Notegerezwa kugira agakorwa akagoye ku banyeshure bisumbuye mu kwongeramwo ibishobisho bindi vyinshi bahitamwo
Notegerezwa gucira urubanza abanyeshure ku mahitamwo y'ibishobisho kanaka

questions.question: Ni ikihe kintu wotegerezwa kuba uriko urakora?
answers: Notegerezwa gushushanya ibishobisho ku rubaho mu kworosha agakorwa ku bana badashoboye gusoma
Notegerezwa kubwira abanyeshure igishogisho ikihe kibereye guhitamwo?
Notegerezwa guhagarika abanyeshure gukina mu gihe bahisemwo igishogisho kitari co

questions.question: Ni akahe karorero k'ikibazo wobaza abanyeshure bawe mu gihe co kurongora ikiganiro muri aka gakorwa?
answers: Ni gute woshobora gukoresha ubumenyi bwo gufata ku mutwe mu buzima bwawe?
Ni gute woshobora gukinga amatati?
Kubera iki ari ngira kamaro gushora kumenya uko wokwiyumva bitaragushikira?

questions.question: Ni abahe banyeshure woshobora guhitamwo ngo basangire n'ishure ibishobisho vyabo bahisemwo?
answers: Notegerezwa misi yose guhitamwo abanyeshure b'incabwenge
Nohitamwo abanyeshure batoye ibishobisho bitandukanye mu gihe badugije ibiganza
Notegerezwa guhitamwo benshi berekanye ko bafise umunezero gusa
